data.title: The Movie DataBase
data.brief: Looking to watch a movie or tv series and don't know in which platform to stream it? This app is for you. My first React project. It's a Front-End connected to an API that, regarding your IP location will serve you where to watch it.

data.title: Crypto Prode
data.brief: The prode is kind of a fantasy football game, very popular in Argentina. The Crypto Prode was intended as a game to be played during the FIFA World Cup hosted in Qatar. Solution developed in Solidity, contract never left GitHub.

data.title: Shine & Care Website
data.brief: A landing page for an Australian cleaning company on the Northern Beaches area. Built with Next.js and Tailwind CSS, it features a modern, responsive design with smooth scrolling and clear calls to action.

data.title: The Hire Me Project - Backend
data.brief: A Node.js and TypeScript backend that automates job ingestion and analysis. It scrapes job listings from LinkedIn and Seek, deduplicates and normalizes data, stores it in a PostgreSQL database using Sequelize, and applies rule-based and AI-driven filters to evaluate job suitability. The backend also integrates with OpenAI for resume parsing, job matching, and cover letter generation.

data.title: The Hire Me Project - Frontend
data.brief: A modern frontend application for exploring, filtering, and evaluating job opportunities processed by THMP. Built with Next.js and React, it provides advanced filtering, keyword highlighting, AI approval indicators, and a clean, responsive UI focused on usability and performance.
